Ancient Power.card_desc: [Overcharge] Hitting an enemy while Overcharge is active reduces the cooldown of Blitz Upper by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Antediluvian.card_desc: [Overcharge] Increase the duration of Overcharge by {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Carry through.card_desc: [Blitz Upper] Hitting an enemy with Blitz Upper grants you {scale=10|10}% movement speed for 3s.

Daredevil.card_desc: [Blitz Upper] Activating Blitz Upper heals you for {scale=70|70} Health.

Dark Vision.card_desc: [Blitz Upper] Killing enemies with Blitz Upper generates {scale=5|5}% ultimate charge.

Eternal.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] The duration of Rune of Travel is increased by {scale=1|1}s.

Evanescent.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Move {scale=8|8}% faster while Rune of Travel is active.

Faustian Bargain.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Rune of Travel no longer automatically activates, and if the Rune is not used the Cooldown is reset.

Guts.card_desc: [Armor] Take {scale=6|6}% less damage when below 40% health.

Inner Strength.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Rune of Travel now resets the Cooldown of Overcharge and Blitz Upper when it activates.

Nothing Personal.card_desc: [True Power] Targets below 65% Health are revealed to you and your Ultimate charge rate is increased by 15%.

Primeval Might.card_desc: [Overcharge] Gain {scale=8|8}% lifesteal while Overcharge is active.

Reclamation.card_desc: [Overcharge] Reduce the Cooldown of Overcharge by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Relic Affinity.card_desc: [Blitz Upper] Hitting an enemy with Blitz Upper generates {scale=4|4} ammo.

Revitalize.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Rune of Travel heals you for {scale=100|100} when you teleport to it.

Transient.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Reduce the cooldown of Rune of Travel by {scale=1|1}s.
